pricer.config¶

It collates and loads user specified configuration for data pipeline.

Module Contents¶

Functions¶

set_loggers(base_logger: bool = None, v: bool = False, vv: bool = False, test: bool = False)

Sets up logging across modules in project.
pricer.config.set_loggers(base_logger: bool = None, v: bool = False, vv: bool = False, test: bool = False) → None¶

Sets up logging across modules in project.

Uses arguments originally specified from command line to set streaming logging level. Log files are written in debug mode.

Args:
base_logger: base logger object instantiated at program run time.

Used to find other log objects across modules.

v: Run in verbose mode (INFO) vv: Run in very verbose mode (DEBUG) test: Override / runs in verbose mode (INFO), in case not

user specified.
